text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
March 12, 1958
Dr, Sam L. Becker, Director
Division of Television, Radio, Film
State University of Iowa
Television Center
609 10th Avenue
Coralville, Iowa
Dear Sam:
Just want to say how pleased I am at your letter to Greer of Ohio re
preparation of his Research Report for the Journal.
I’ve passed on to Schooley. He’ll be looking for it, for publication.
Keep up the good work, Sam. It’s a pleasure to have people with your
initiative to work with.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJS/dfc
CC: Frank Schooley
